89  class TidalTermTriplet {
90  public:
91  double
93  m_minus_one,
94 
96  m,
97 
99  m_plus_one;
100 
101  TidalTermTriplet(double m_minus_one_value = 0.0,
102  double m_value = 0.0,
103  double m_plus_one_value = 0.0):
104  m_minus_one(m_minus_one_value),
105  m(m_value),
106  m_plus_one(m_plus_one_value)
107  {}
108 
109  TidalTermTriplet &operator=(const TidalTermTriplet &rhs)
110  {
111  m_minus_one = rhs.m_minus_one;
112  m = rhs.m;
113  m_plus_one = rhs.m_plus_one;
114  return *this;
115  }
116  };

538 
540  double tidal_power(
545  bool above,
546 
548  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
549  ) const
550  {
551  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
552  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
553 
554  assert(entry <= Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV);
555  assert(2 * entry + 1 < static_cast<int>(__power.size()));
556 
557  return __power[2 * entry + (above? 1 : 0)];
558  }
559 
562  double tidal_power(
565  double above_fraction,
566 
568  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
569  ) const
570  {
571 
572  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
573  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
574 
575  assert(!locked() || (above_fraction >= 0 && above_fraction <= 1));
576  assert(entry <= Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV);
577  assert(2 * entry + 1 < static_cast<int>(__power.size()));
578 
579  return (
580  above_fraction * __power[2 * entry + 1]
581  +
582  (1.0 - above_fraction) * __power[2 * entry]
583  );
584  }
585 
589  double tidal_torque_x(
590  bool above,
591  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
592  ) const
593  {
594  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
595  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
596 
597  assert(entry <= Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV);
598  assert(2 * entry + 1 < static_cast<int>(__torque_x.size()));
599 
600  return __torque_x[2 * entry + (above ? 1 : 0)];
601  }
602 
605  double tidal_torque_x(
608  double above_fraction,
609 
612  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
613  ) const
614  {
615  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
616  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
617 
618  assert(
619  !locked() || (above_fraction >= 0 && above_fraction <= 1)
620  );
621  assert(entry <= Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV);
622  assert(
623  2 * entry + 1
624  <
625  static_cast<int>(__torque_x.size())
626  );
627 
628  return (above_fraction * __torque_x[2 * entry + 1]
629  +
630  (1.0 - above_fraction) * __torque_x[2 * entry]);
631  }
632 
636  double tidal_torque_y(
637  bool above,
638  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
639  ) const
640  {
641  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
642  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
643 
644  assert(entry <= Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV);
645  assert(
646  2 * entry + 1
647  <
648  static_cast<int>(__torque_y.size())
649  );
650 
651  return __torque_y[2 * entry + (above? 1 : 0)];
652  }
653 
656  double tidal_torque_y(
659  double above_fraction,
660 
663  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
664  ) const
665  {
666  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
667  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
668 
669  assert(!locked() || (above_fraction >= 0 && above_fraction <= 1));
670  assert(entry <= Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV);
671  assert(2 * entry + 1 < static_cast<int>(__torque_y.size()));
672 
673  return (above_fraction * __torque_y[2 * entry + 1]
674  +
675  (1.0 - above_fraction) * __torque_y[2 * entry]);
676  }
677 
681  double tidal_torque_z(
682  bool above,
683  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
684  ) const
685  {
686  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
687  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
688

694 
697  double tidal_torque_z(
700  double above_fraction,
701 
704  Dissipation::QuantityEntry entry=Dissipation::NO_DERIV
705  ) const
706  {
707  if(entry == Dissipation::EXPANSION_ERROR)
708  entry = Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV;
709 
710  assert(!locked() || (above_fraction >= 0 && above_fraction <= 1));
711  assert(entry < Dissipation::END_DIMENSIONLESS_DERIV);
712  assert(2 * entry + 1 < static_cast<int>(__torque_z.size()));
713 
714  return (above_fraction * __torque_z[2 * entry + 1]
715  +
716  (1.0 - above_fraction) * __torque_z[2 * entry]);
